response.overview: In Search of the Devil, it tells the story of a group of young people who find themselves in a big nightmare in the village where they went to search for the devil. Metin, Doğuş, Kübra and Can are university students living in the same house. Metin, who learns that there is a devil in a village while surfing the internet, decides to look for the devil. The young people who set out without wasting time are accompanied by their friend Damla. On this journey to seek the devil, young people are unaware that the devil is waiting for them.
response.title: Şeytanı Ararken
